nodes.bodyText: Should this have the relocation section added since there is a Track 2 client for EventHubs?
That is a good point Alan - ideally yes, we should start relocating as soon as we believe we have a replacement for the existing track one library.
Should this have the relocation section added since there is a Track 2 client for LeyVault?
